IIT - all reported safe, RJ Balaji. Water logging manageable.

Area ok but still no power, no network. Roads are blocked and no easy way to go anywhere. So everyone just staying in-house.

Dec 5th, 9 amAvenue 9,18 are the ones which are affected quite badly. No current, No network, water logging till knee. Managed to talk to few ppl and they said provisions and foods are already there with them. Need to go to Avenue 16 and 18 tomorrow. All the others places are completely fine with very minimal water loggings and current is disconnected just as precautionary measure.Ashok Nagar Metro station is open, trains running

2 nd cross. Customs colony safe. No basic supplies.

Immediate to the camproad junction area, very little rain over past 12 hours. No water logging around Rajeshwari Nagar, camproad junction.

power not restored, vodafone working, aircel reachable

Chromepet area absolutely no water logging

Water logging receding from 3-4ft to below knee level
Dec 4, 7:15 am IST rescue available. food being distributed.
Dec 4th 4:29AM IST: Spoke to someone who answered the phones in Commissioner's office who was very patient but at the same time very generic and didn't want to get into specifics. I inquired about KK Nagar, CIT Nagar and Thoraipakkam. He said that the water level has come down drastically in the past few hours in these areas and asked not to panic if they are not accessible via phone. Everyone in these areas have been offered food and there is no power or phone line connection yet.
Water logging receding from 3-4ft to below knee level

Most people have been evacuated or moved to higher floors in interior lanes of anna enclave, bethel nagar vettuvankeni, neelangarai, kottivakam,palavakkam on the other side of ecr road (left side while going towards the city), Iscon temple areas too. Still not safe to venture into.
Other side of road from what is mentioned in 'Status' and interior lanes- dry and safe

Kasi theatre bridge is motorable
3rd Dec, 3PM IST - Defence Colony  - Near Kasi theatre. Personnel evacuated to Military Hospital/ Water levels still around 2.5 FT but receding.

Water is draining. Around 2 feet of water only. No rains last night
Montieth road, Dec 3rd, 8.47pm: Thigh high water. Pazhamudir cholai open with no milk, bread and vegetables\
Water is draining. Around 2 feet of water only. No rains last night
Palavathangal subway clear. No water logging anywhere. Moderate traffic on GST road

Race view colony 2nd street area ( near race course) 
sporadic signal and no power yet and no water logging area guindy
Overall there is improvement in all these areas in terms of the reduction in the water level. (Less than 1 feet) - - Thamizharasan Karunakaran

Jafferkanpet/Kasi theatre : Nil water stagnation in the main roads and negligible water stagnation in the side roads. I could verify upto 2/3 streets in the sides of the arterial roads.Kasi theatre bridge which was reportedly shaking is absolutely safe & vehicles moving.

The water has drained in and around gangai Amman koil street, able to get out of the house and go around.  Situation is much better guys, just ask your family to stock up in good water and stay put for next 5-6 days till all the rain subsides.
No Power. Only bsnl mobile and landlines seem to work.  We got other aircell airtel mobile landlines that just would not work.

BOATS AND NDRF IN OPERATION
Water levels receding. Many people in the area with rescue operations, but while it is slow, good news is water levels are slowly going down.

my friend spoke to her parents in k k ponnuragam salai, they said there is very lil water of 1-2ft around banyan tree and ganesha temple..the megamart area is still blocked...the water has resided alot,where it was flooded too..
Only waterlogged in small pockets but everything is manageable around,people are going to get supplies and stuff on their own..

Report from person on Santhome high road, some patches of water, but definitely motorable - 8.30AM IST.
Updated at 11.30 am IST, December 3rd - Direct report from cousin - Shastri nagar, 8th cross. That water levels are coming down. People are largely indoors and safe on thus street.

5:18PM DLF Gardens: gensets in basement flooded, no diesel. Dec 5th- 8.30 AM- Pudunagar water logging

Dec 4th 08:00AM - Water is draining in Mudichur and Tambaram areas, now only 2 to 3 feet water in mudichur that too for short stretches, power came in most of the areas. No worries and not need to panic about tambaram area.
East tambaram area update near rajakilpakkam: Dec 4, 630 am, no rains since yesterday. Just intermittent showers. Landlines and mobiles not working for most of us but a few numbers get connected occasionally. No flooding.
Dec 4th 1:14am - West Tambaram - Water levels are receding, and power has been restored a few hours back.
Dec 6th 8.30 am- West Tambaram- No rains, water logging in some streets, rest drained out. Water logging in following areas of Mudichur: CTO Colony,Krishna Nagar and roads going into interior Mudichur.

Dec 3rd, 22:00: Water in area has completey drained.

Dec 4th 21:00 IST : Internet is back on in some parts around Pondy Bazar, electricity and phone lines working. Heavy rains started again, but no signs of flooding yet
Dec 5 2:00 pm - N. Usman Road: ankle length water , enough to commute vehicles in most parts, Burkit rd - water free roads

Dec 5, 4 AM.  No current and no network in almost all the places. Very minimal water loggings, provisions are already there for people,Most of the shops are accessible.
Area back to normalcy. Everybody is getting food and water. Some people cooking in their own houses

Area is mostly back to normalcy. Everybody is getting food and water. Some people cooking in their own houses. CWPD Quarters is fine.  Bharatidasan Colony is still affected - need to mobilize resources for food and water, although nearby people are providing some help. But people are safe, and old people needing medical attention have already been taken to hospital
There is still some water stagnation.
water is knee level and receding. we are looking to mobilize resources for food and water.
water is knee level and receding. we are looking to mobilize resources for food and water.Balaji nagar,Alwarthirunagar - Water is around 1.5 feet. shops have also opened.
Dec 4, 10:00 AM - Phone lines are down...both landline and cell phones.
There is still some water stagnation. Jains ashraya apartments in vembuli Amman koil street is damaged till ground floor and people have been moved to the upper floors and nearby safe places.

Kambar Street and 1st Main Road near Vinayagam Ave- Both places have knee-deep water still, although it seems to be receding. They had some heavy intermittent showers but nothing too bad. Power is intermittent (was on for a few hours yesterday and just came now; enough to charge phones). ATMs dont have any money. Medical shops are open. Not navigable by motorbike, though.

However, the main road is relatively clear of water. IN some areas with water, people are safe if they stay put at home. People commute by boat between apartments. .  Karapakkam is still a little flooded.
Foreshore Estate Airtel office to Park Sheraton full straight is motorable. Water logged from Kaliappa to Park Sheraton
Waterlogging on santhome high rd (near hotel palmshore) & one lane in Nungambakkam high road till Gemini for 300 yards. Chetpet bridge made two-way.

Karpagam gardens: Landlines working for the past 2 hours, Occasional cell phone (mostly vodafone) signal from terrace. Water has been receding and pumped out occasionally until noon or so. Intermittent rains/ heavy rains in the afternoon for 20 mins.  Adyar area would get power for 2 hours only once the water logging is at safe levels
Near Ashtalakshmi temple area: Water has been receding and pumped out occasionally until noon or so. Intermittent rains/ heavy rains in the afternoon for 20 mins.
Asvini Atrium water completely drained, traffic has resumed on Valluvar salai.
Working scarcely and intermittently. Keep trying until you gain contact.
Kasturba Nagar 4th and 5th Main Road have 2ft water. sewage water has mixed with rain water and entered many houses in our neighbourhood.hired pvt motors

On ground live update - Near PSBB and Lakshmanasamy Salai - very little water on road. Heavy rains let up, but still drizziling right now
Dec 5 8:30 pm - MGR Nagar near Data Udupi bus stand, conditions good. No water logging.

power there since yesterday, low voltage, phone networks still poor
Dec 5 8:30 pm - Power not yet up in MGR nagar
Roads towards Thiruporur not motorable for small cars due to some damage near Thayyur. Only CVs can go
Waterlogging up to 3 ft, mixed with sewer water.
IDBI Bank ATM on Dr. Nair Road and Syndicate Bank ATM opposite Residency are working.
Almost no water logging on the roads, except at the Bus Depot. Normal traffic right now.
All retired defence personnel have been rescued and housed in the Military hospital. All civilians in the area are in Cantonment Centre in St. Thomas mount.
Roads are motorable up to Vels University.
Power restored in parts of the area near Shankara colony
Power restored in Besant Nagar, Rukmini Road, and nearby areas.
Is back to normal. Only petrol is on demand
Lamech school road area all fine
Some cell towers working. Power yet to come.
Electricity restored, no network connectivity yet.
f47th street, 9th avenue - raining on and off, no stagnant water on 47th street, but no power and bad network.
Area near 108 majestic colony - people are safe

No water stagnation, roads dry. Shops open. Seems safe.
Telephone connections (BSNL landline) intermittent.
Power not up. Since one of the supply boards is in contact with stagnated water - power may not be up till Monday. Mobile networks seem to work, but no electricity.

5 Cars have made it to Bangalore via Chetpet - Aminjikarai - Poonamallee. The road till Bangalore is dry. Sriperambadur and Kanchipuram are not flooded! Take the Parry's - Central and reach Chetpet, cross Anna Arch and stick to the highway. Stay close to the median in case they are clogged. All the buses are running from Koyambedu
The road is quite good. There are areas that have potholes, but no water logging at all
Porur signal is free to vehicular traffic since morning
Rajaji Colony - all seems fine. Power and phone connectivity stil bad, but safe for now.
Power, phone situation still bad. But area is safe.
Roads clear from Eldams road till Adyar
Not more than ankle high water, no one stuck anywhere

no problem except for a bit of water logging near the playground next to Music College.
ROUTE: Greenways Road signal to Boat Club area
Power coming back, Internet coming back in parts too
ROUTE: TTK Road signal to RA Puram
no problem, but a bit of water logging near Billroth Hospital.
ROUTE: Adyar signal to Thiruvanmiyur signal
no problem, but the Adyar Flyover is closed.
heavy water logging towards Buckingham Canal AND towards Tidel Park SIGNAL (basically the only 2 options to reach the OMR)
the roads are clear. No water logging and moving traffic. Shops are open.
along TTK Road, Eldams Road, Nandanam: 2-3 feet of water, advised not to travel there.
ROUTE: Koyembedu flyover to Chetpet Bridge
Absolutely no problem on the roads.
again, no problem, except for a bit of water logging on Nungambakkam High Road.
ROUTE: Gemini to TTK Road signal
Turn left towards thiruvanmiyur...there are pockets of waterlogging but motorable
R.K.Shanmugam salai, K.K. Nagar. Current has been restored.Waterr logging (knee level) near Double tank in R.K.Shanmugam salai.
Areas around ESI, Sivan Park, Anna main road

Areas in and around 10th street, bajaj apartments, Nandanam - dried up with only patches of water here and there. It did rain heaily between 2 and 6 PM but that has no effect on the situation. Also near new tower block and 4th street water has drained down to ground level. Anna Salai also dried considerably.
Electricity/power is back up around 9.00 PM IST
10th Street, New tower block, 4th street, parts of Anna salai near nandanam
Shanti Colony: No water logging. power back. Some phone connectivity
SIDCO Nagar 5ft water, corporation pumping out slowly.
Water around balaji dental college has about 3 feet of water
Shops are open n some ATMs in #Kottur have started working. Cellphone networks are working fine too. Electricity is also back
Cellphone networks are working fine too. Electricity is also back

close to Arcot road near Lamech School (Ceebros Park) water levels are manageable and few shops are open along Radhakrishnan Road.  shops are running out of essentials like mineral water and it's also very difficult to get milk and vegetables. The power is on and off, and mobile networks has started to function in the area.
Valasaravakkam -Kesavarthini area. Things are OK. Water logging is not bad. Essentials are available in the area.
Power connectivity is on and off. Spotty telephone connectivity.

Dec 5,2015 9 am : Water logged near LIC nagar and madipakkam bus stand area, update from a friends mom staying in balaiya garden
RAM NAGAR PICS : https://www.facebook.com/groups/ChennaiFloods/permalink/1686594064887851/
RAM NAGAR SOUTH VIDEO : https://www.facebook.com/groups/ChennaiFloods/permalink/1686581211555803/
Ramnagar and Kuberan nagar still water logged but people have been well taken care of. Places until Ramnagar bus stop are dry, shops open. Water levels receding and should be completely drained by noon tomorrow, if no rains.

No flooding in Zamin/old Pallavaram. 
area near dharga road is clear. 
Main bus stand in Pallavaram on the GST road has no water stagnation.

https://www.facebook.com/groups/ChennaiFloods/permalink/1686524618228129/
Tansi, Baby, Udayam and Ram Nagar flooded - 4ft water
Factory area. Water levels are receding on the ground floor. People are safe and there is food and water.
Still poor connectivity, limited power. But safe.
vembuliamman koil street, virugambakkam - spoke to police commisioner - water logging still there - but is coming down fast and should be done by noon.
Power out still due to water logging, but people safe. Mobile networks down.

From thoraipakkam to Madhya kailash to guindy to porur - Bangalore highway. Crossing vellore now.. Except porur, water completely drained out from the roads. Porur only 1ft water . outside porur little showers only from today evening. Friends were able to reach koyembedu through OMR. Saidapet buses , 19b Paris buses are operational. From kathipara to porur no tower signal. Its still in black box.
Bsnl landline connections are getting restored in porur now. Ppl can listen to 104.8 who gives many information.
Park Dugar Area ok. Only power was lost. No significant water logging issues.
Places in and around Liberty , Fathima convent has no problem they can access Spencer's daily and all the shops in station roads now.
No network but current is there in most of the places.

WEST MAMBALAM (Arya Gowda street, Postal colony, KV colony, Rangarajapuram,United colony,fathima convent) - No current , Network is available for airtel alone in few places, Water logging below knee level, all the provisions are accessible)
AFFECTED AREAS - After raghavendra mandapam water close to knee level, No current, No network, Water cans and foods are already provided, People in the ground floor in streets Aziz Nagar, Subramaniam Nagar already vacated the place.
Aircel and BSNL Landlines working. Power available 2 hrs per day
Just spoke to my mother in Alwarthirunagar. She, my uncle and aunts are all safe but marooned in their own little island. Cell phone keeps getting dropped but at least talked to her.
Power is back in alwarthirunagar .  Landline (BSNL) is not working. Stores are opened, still water on the streets.
Still issues with mobile calls, but mobile internet is working.
Alwarthirunagar, Valasravakkam. Phone connections are getting restored in Valsaravakkam. But there is still water logging in the area..
Alwarthirunagar, Valasravakkam. Phone connections are getting restored in Valsaravakkam. But there is still water logging in the area..

The interiors are still flooded and not accessible by normal vehicles. But there are lotta army men who access these areas with military vehicles supplying food, water and as much supplies as possible.
No power supply and no mobile network.
Ashtalakshmi nagar, valasaravakkam. There is some water logging
landline / cell is still down though.
gandhingar 2nd main road near grand sweets, mild drizzle, sun peaking out, power there, milk, paper also being delivered

Near arcot road is perfectly fine, can commute to and from Alwarthirunagar comfortably. All petrol pumps open but shortage of fuel supply. Petrol pumps near Poonamalee high road seem to have fuel supply and the road is perfectly fine. SRMC is open and functioning. Slight water logging in the area, nothing major.
No power supply and some cell phone towers are working
Power is back, cell phone towers working
Water clearing away - Babu Rajendra Prasad street near mambalam station- ppl are safe. Shops are open but water still logged but receding.

Thillai ganga nagar subway has been drained totally and now open for traffic..people coming from airport or guindy can take this subway to move towards Adambakkam, Nanganallur, Madipakkam and Velachery

Saidapet, west jones road, near jeyaraj theatre
they have no signal or current yet but it is expected back soon. All water drained.
47th Street - 1st hand report. All safe, lot of damage from ground floor level water. But all people safe, water has receded now.
Andal avenue, gandhi road Velachery - all safe. Power back, phones working.
Kalakshetra road has still knee level water. Not advisable to take the route via Besant nagar to thiruvanamiyur. BSNL is working
All areas waterlogging seems to have gone, it is back to being fully safe. Power back, phone still down
BSNL is back across Mambalam; Balakrishnan Street specifically (behind Ayodhya Mandapam), power also restore

Bhuvaneshwari nagar 2nd main road (behind Chennai silks) ‪#Velachery‬ is safe.
However bhuvaneshwari nagar (behind Chennai silks) is still stagnant with hip deep water. Also rescue team from pudhiya thalaimurai etc had reached the place and distributed milk n food.

Ram nagar main road 1-7 are now drained out and ground floor houses have drained out. Buses are plying from main road 45N... 8th main and beyond still has about knee level water and so is north extension interiors.
Dec 5 pm: LIC Nagar 4th Main Madipakkam - power is back
PT rajan salai upto double tank motorable & from there on inside KK Nagar people are stepping out and even milk vans are supplying. Water level upto 1 ft.
Industrial Estate left: people stuck earlier - all cleared now. Accessible now, no waterlogging.

Kathipara is completely open and safe. From kathipara went right towards manapakam to porur road. Zero water stagnation and the bridge near MIOT is open with water levels under the bridge pretty less not anywhere near the top of the bridge.  L&T/DLF completely dry and accessible.
Water is draining very slowly in Balaji Nagar and surrounding streets. Milk and other essentials are being delivered near alwarthirunagar main road. Public transportation have resumed services.
Very poor cell phone coverage and power is not restored yet.
National Institue of Ocean Technology (NIOT) is under the armed forces, not accessible by vehicles

Route from cmbt to poonamalle high road or maduravoyal is blocked. heavy traffic.
Vehicles are stranded past one hr and moving in every possible direction. 8th St, 4th Blk, evrythng s normal now but, tel network is down
People stuck in the inner lanes opp kailash resort. People are in their houses. There are boats and teams that come to the main road to ferry food and stuff.
No power, No ATM's either. Indian Oil petrol pump beside Meenakshi College is open on Arcot road
Power is back in Kottivakkam Kuppam road, Valmiki nagar
Ankle lever water - Ragavendra mandapam, Saamiyar madam, Rangarajapuram near More supermarket, Five lights, Umapathy street, Power house to bridge, Vivek's flyover (it's open two-way)
Velachery AGS colony power back. Mobile connection back. Water receded.
Ethiraj College road dry, Haddows road free drive.
No water stagnation, some shops open supermarket open(Reliance fresh and More market)
OMR from Navalur to Madhya Kailash is pretty dry
Power restored.Airtel and BSNL mobile phones are reachable.
Power restored.Airtel and BSNL mobile phones are reachable.

Route: Arcot Road, 100ft road, Jawaharlal Nehru salai, Kathipara fly over, Poonamalee road, Manapakkam main road. Route till Manapakkam signal is good. Roads are bit damaged in Manappakam main road. Road has caved-in in one of the section, so the road is narrow. Water level has receded a lot in main areas.
Madipakkam, ponniamman kovil street. Not much rain today. Water has not been high in this streets. Milk and veggies are available. But a long queue.
Power is 50% time up. No mobile network yet. BSNL landline is working.
Main roads dry, inroads still flooded to about waist level water although apartments are alright.
Apartment with generators get about 6 hours power everyday. Otherwise, power and mobile network still down
TNHB Colony is very safe. Inside 4th Avenue water is receeding but not fully drained out. Nothing serious here. Power is also back on now. Network should be back soon
Power is back. Netwrok should be back soon.
Bains Baptist school. Plenty of food supply available, in 100,000 numbers. Continuous cooking. Volunteers pl collect and distribute SACHIN R MEHTA 98400 5757

Rangarajapuram has water logging but only in few stretches.. Kodambakkam - water level a have come down to a minimum.. All shops are open and people are starting to come outside in all these areas.. There is still no power in most of the streets in the above mentioned areas.. Mobile connectivity is sporadic and u might get connectivity if u move out to terrace, outside ur house or nearby streets #chennairains
No power, sporadic cell signals, no landlines
Area is good. Cars going around distributing food and water. Aranganathan subway drained, expecting access to West saidapet soon
WORKING ATM INFO - Bank of Baroda, opp Spencers Daily. SBI near Liberty theatre

sarathy. nagar west saidapet. Near by landmark is jaferkhanpet and saidapet sudukadu . This places are the low lying areas in saidapet and this location is perfectly all right. All are safe.

Following murahari salai, punniya kodi st and the two more streets in that line is also all right.

parsn nagar -- Ground floor fully water yesterday full water drained,parsn people everybody safe
Kamatchipuram 1st street 3 ft water, being pumped out now
West Jones road- amber apartments nearby they r able to get everything nearby.shops r open.and water receded...no worries as f now
WORKING ATM INFO - SBI near Bakya fast food
waterlogging to a considerable height of 2-3 feet
no power, no mobile network yet
padmavathy nagar water below knee level. Everyone safe; Sanjay Gandhi nagar, Elango Nagar - Water almost receded, power back but no communication lines
No Power. no communication lines yet
Rajaji nagar main road, Power is back on but fluctuating. Decent connectivity, ankle high water.
Ramnagar South - Water levels receding, knee level or less. Careful walking advised. Sadasivam nagar is clear
Kuberan nagar extension is flooded main toad ok
Otteri and inside is good, with supplies and all.
Food is being distributed, NDRF and Army helping well. Not entirely accessible, heavy water flow

ALERT - Electrical wires in the water, don't venture into it. Power has been shut down in most areas but some places wires are conducting. Streets name - Bharathi street, madurai street,vadivelu all cross street) near bus depot.
Ram Nagar and Muruga Nagar- The whole ground floor is flooded some ppl still stuck in buildings. being provided with food and water
The madipakkam main roads are perfectly fine. Bone dry. Just that areas near the water bunds arent accessible after a certain point. Power restored at around 11 am at madipakkam only certain areas.
Little water logged near Ambedkar statue. Few buses from Vadapalani in operation

Kottupuram bridge is still shut. from signal under cenotaph road bridge till french loaf / citibank atm. .
They are pumping out water and road is damaged
Might be tomorrow till they let people across
Housing board road is dry, garbage mostly
1st street and all water being pumped out
2nd street dry but no power and limited phone signals
The area near THE PARK is waterlogged with knee level water. Two wheelers not advisable

Water logged from station onwards in nearby streets -little below knee level. Some sewage water outflows too..causing contamination...Help needed to clear the water. .Not many shops open on W.Mambalam station side. Ranganathan street many shops were trying to open and cleanup. no power in this area as of this afternoon.

Kuppam area - place still has significant water stagnation. Today some of them were able to get back to their house since water receded but still majority's house is still under water. They are housed in schools, temple and marriage Hall. No major aid here, and they are getting food and clothes from nearby houses. BUt no major volunteer groups are headed here.
power is back. Vodafone signal is available but patchy.
power is back. Vodafone signal is available but patchy.
Power and landlines up in Rajalakshmi Nagar.
Mega mart, Arcot road - Milk supply available cheaply.

Ambattur to Kaduvetti via Thirumullaivoyal, Ayapakkam, Veeraraghavapuram (Avadi) all motorable. Ayapakkam has potholes though. Avadi to Maduravoyal is blocked as the Avadi bridge fell so you can go via Thiruverkadu (Paruthipattu route). Thiruverkadu to Maduravoyal near Ayanambakkam road is blocked as lines are beign restored.
Power isn't back for most parts, water levels have receded to knee level almost everywhere. Isolated cases of hip level water. Mobile networks not functioning, except BSNL in some parts.
Update from marvel river view county. Water receded. Power restored. They were able to venture out to the main road
Areas near chandra metro mall is water logged. Invisible and bad. Do not venture out with two wheelers. Lambert nagar and vembuliamman koil street with knee level water
Gandhi Rd-Power back but no phones- cell or landline. ACT connection is working. water logging in interior part of Gandhi Rd. shops closed but milk and vegetables available.. Situation ok.
Kundrathur main road is motorable, can reach Madananandhapuram safely
Basin Bridge Route motorable from one direction

Potholes on N. Boag Road. No power, complete darkness. Drivers avoid
accessible from Kasi Arcade only. Ankle-deep water at GN Chetty Road end.
Gandhinagar- power up, landline and cell working, internet working, light drizzle.
North Usman Road, from viveks towards mahalingapuram bridge,  Ankle-deep water. Motorable
Power back in all parts of sakthi nagar. Landline & Airtel functional.
Roads clear from Sriperumbudur to Poonamallee to Porur to Guindy to Madipakkam via St.Thomas Mount subway
Petrol and diesel available in bunk near malar Hosp. Open till 11 pm.
TTK Rd, Eldams Rd, Bharathidasan Rd, Seethammal Colony waterlogged. Pumping underway.

natesan nagar, kaliyaman koil st, most parts of saligramam are fine. Water here and there maybe, but all motorable. 
One side of arcot road is functioning. Vembuliamman koil street is v bad. Hip level water, no power, no network. It looks like a lot of people have moved out, but whoever is still present definitely need help.
Elliamman Kovil street and adjacent streets have shin-knee level water.
Koyembedu is fine and a policeman told me that buses to all places are running. Local Buses (free - no ticket now), auto, share auto running, most shops opened etc.
Power restored on both sides of 100 Ft Rd Velachery
West Mambalam, near Ayodhya Mandapam Pillayar kovil -The area is limping back to normalcy.
They have power, network and landline. No cell phone coverage yet. Whatsapp is the best way to get in touch.

Near Avichi school- Water has receded well. Roads are functional from big bazaar though there still is a lot of water(Ankle deep) near chandra mall along with a ton of potholes(Bikers beware!). roads should back to usable condition if it does not rain tomorrow.
Power is back near avichi school and sathya garden.
Perungudi, no flooding on omr outside Perungudi, but inner roads some are ok, some are bad
still no power and no network.
Only one way to reach mambalam n kkn. GN Chetty road to Kodambakkam bridge to arcot road to ambedkar salai straight
Ankle to knee level water in some areas. Relief workers get vehicle like ace to get in since lots of narrow streets
Mambalam Kamatchipuram 1st st light - Most of the water pumped out.
No waterlogging in mannivakkam around the Serene Adinath building. Power up but mobile connections & landline patchy.
Power up. Mobile/Phones still up and down.
Near VV Giri street: water mostly receded. Not sure of landline/power mobile patchy.
Mobile patchy; Power up in some places.
. Road adjacent to Valasaravakkam Mega mart has been blocked due to heavy water log.
Heavy rains have commenced; TTK Salai in particular.
Terminals are being opened for departing flights.
Besant Nagar - no prob. All fine. It's raining now but till yesterday shops were open.

roads from tambaram to velachery is motorable. roads near Pallikaranai police station is narrow and has huge potholes. buses ply between tambaram and Medavakkam. Alternatively use Tambaram > Medavakkam coot road > Kovilambakkam > Kamakshi hospital > Velachery.
towards Padmavathy Nagar(& ram nagar Extn) .. All roads okay, power restored as well
in Sriram nagar.. There water was hip deep- but relief boats reaching with material

Kelambakkam to Bangalore today.Vandalur road water logged but motorable. Outer Ring Road good and Poonamallee road till Kancheepuram not too bad - potholes are there but can maintain decent speed. Raining heavily now.
aminjikarai normalcy returns in aminjikarai NM road PH road.All ATMs shops fuel pumps functional
Vodafone signal is up - though not strong in the Perumbakkam area
Mostly clear. Small stretch with water. Just before ambica empire
Road is good upto Vellore. Its cloudy here now but No rains. Around 200kms more to Bangalore. Not much of traffic on the road. There are buses plying on this route.
very few flights are on from CHN to BLR. From Air India and Indigo.
govindan road , lakshmi street post colony and all that surrounding areas . water and receded 95 percent and roads accessible

11:00 am Hindu Colony, Nanganallur also ok. Seems corporation staff flushed out drains 2 days back.
 
Nanganallur entirely clear.

Power restored and constant rains, not heavy though. #Velachery #AreaUpdates

viruddhachalam - kumbakonam - mayavaram. Safe and motorable
Constant downpours in madipakkam surroundings.Area s clear to commute.. Expt kuberan nagar interiors,Ram nagar..
Bhuvaneshwari Nagar, Saraswathy Nagar, Andal Nagar, Mahalakshmi Nagar water drained. Power restored
Waterlogging due to recent heavy rains
no power no signal... not much water. no lights so not safe to travel at night.. fod packets reaching to ppl there
Mellony road, thomas road- No power no singal... not safe to travel at night.. ppl have enough food and water. accessible theu vehicle
People evacuated from here and are safe.
People evacuated from here and are safe.
Road blocked, due to accident and tree fall. cannot turn into SIET road.
OMR, Thoraipakkam - Pallavaram Road, Airport Road all fully operational. Self driven and checked
Power back in Raju st around arya gowda Road, From half way of arya gowda road until ayodhya mandapam and from Mahadevan St towards Ashok nagar

Krishnagiri -  Its cloudy but no rains here. Roads are excellent and no traffic on the road.
The roads from Krishnagiri to Electronic City are in good condition. Travelled in a regular car/sedan. The roads are in pretty good condition for the most part of the trip. The main challenge seems to be getting to Poonamallee from Chennai city.
Power back in Raju st around arya gowda Road, From half way of arya gowda road until ayodhya mandapam and from Mahadevan St towards Ashok nagar

13 mins ago -- hospital road , Behind jai garden bus stop. Next stop after valsaravakkam towards porur. -- There is no water in the flats now. Phones are working, cellphone connection is spotty. Water level is receding
Pondy bazaar petrol pump is accessible. All stores like Nalli are open but can't swipe cards. Avoid TP road, Bazullah road, Habibullah road and GN Chetty road, still water logged
chennai - cbe route : Vellore route. Salem - darmapuri - Krishna giri - vellore - poonamallee. I know someone that travelled on Friday.
LB road good to use, Indian Bank ATM is loaded and open to use.
Porur No rain. Power was up for 30 mins in Sakthi Nagar. Seeing BSNL,Airtel/Cel,Vodafone,Idea signal
Road from KKNagar to Porur via AshokNagar OlympiaTechPark is clear.
Brindavan street n Doraisamy subway blocked.
Perumbakkam Medavakkam - sholinganallur link road is open.Stretch near BharatiVidyalaya school is completely torn up.So travel 1 side only
Taramani link road 95% clear, water stagnant at 2 places, but motorable.
Ponnamalee-mudravoyal-anna nagar-villivakkam. No rains. Water logging very little.
anna nagar. No rains. Water logging very little.
villivakkam. No rains. Water logging very little.
Velachery PhoenixMall roads are fine in 100ft road.
Drive to guindy via link road is good but very bad potholes. HDFC and IndusInd bank ATM not working.
Entire Sardar Patel road, Adyar signal, Adyar bridge, RK Mutt road EXCELLENT

Kasturba Nagar, Nehru nagar and Indira Nagar,Except Kb nagar 1st, 2nd, 3rd main and the 3rd cross street, most areas have water logging though ankle deep. These water stagnant areas are foul smelling and seem to have sewage mixed with it. Power is there in most places. Except for SB Travancore, nearby atm didn't have cash. Banks were open. Saw plenty of milk. No toor dal, moong daal in most stores. 3rd main is cordoned off for repair work near GKb opticals
Road is waterlogged (ankle deep) between Kilkattalai bus stand & Grand Sweets. Drive safe.
Traffic due to water outside Jerusalem coll. Motorable
Approach Road from Mambalam to Rangarajapuram still flooded. 6.05 pm.
roads fine and power available. Balaji dental college road not great but SUVs can drive.
Absolutely superb roads . No rain. All clear
Medavakkam toward Sholinganallur is open & traffic can move. Waterlogging receding.
Both lakes on 200 ft road btwn Pallavaram & Kilkattalai are *FINE*. Smooth traffic in the area. Dont believe rumors.

Seethammal colony: There is still a fair bit of water logging. There are  machines pumping out water this evening and through the night. There is some significant seepage that is refilling the water which they pump out. They have brought sandbags to close the seepage and then the water should be removed after that.. estimates differ, but its likely it will be done in a day or two.
Airport to resume full operations from Dec 7th, 6 am, including international flights
Roads clear at Koyambedu, traffic resumed as usual
Large parts of Guindy towards Saidapet and Mount road have no street lights and zero Vodafone signal. No rains.
Adjoining lake and road at the same level with the water flowing over it. If it continues to rain overnight, situation could worsen.
Route clear. But drive carefully. Too many pot holes. Buses started plying in the route
Thiruvanmiyur RTO Beach Roads motorable. Residents start seeing infections n swelling, mosquitoes frenzy
Water logging isn't an issue at all and power back. Phone lines are still down

route from siet to seethammal colony - knee to waist deep water levels. Cannot wade through. There's a huge pit on the left side of the road post siet towards rapuram at seethammal colony. It's pitch dark out there. There's a barricade but the place is not cordoned off. No electricity. Not Easy to motor if you are unfamiliar with the location of pit. There's a random tree branch stuck there, perhaps as an indicator of danger. Avoid the stretch.
Chennai airport gets nod for night operations, all flights to resume today - #TOI

Lambert Nagar area , School street, behind Vembuliamman koil , Virugambakkam and surroundings (behind CSI CHRIST CHURCH) are submerged with No sign of any authorities taking any steps or even pay visit the place to make efforts of draining the water. There has been No power since Tuesday noon and there is hip deep water on the road. This is just hardly 300 metres from Arcot road. My flat is in this area and I evacuated yesterday (6th December 2015). There are still minimum of 100 families around our flat, who couldn't step out and brave their lives in the sewage mixed water. Pls share this and bring to notice of govt officials to save this small stretch that has been neglected for the past week... You can contact me at 9884663577 (msg\whatsapp\facebook)..the map location (near to accurate is here...
